summary: Team Rocket's memories of Mewtwo had been erased, but the Team Rocket scientists' logs have not. After uncovering the logs, they track down Mewtwo and build a Base in a Johto. Ash and company meet Mr. Giovanni for the first time.
cast: Veronica Taylor|Rachael Lillis|Eric Stuart|Madeleine Blaustein|Ikue Ôtani|Amy Birnbaum|Rodger Parsons|Dan Green|Megan Hollingshead|Tara Sands|Michael Haigney|Ted Lewis|Scott Rayow|Kayzie Rogers|Kerry Williams|Masachika Ichimura|Inuko Inuyama|Mayumi Izuka|Kotono Mitsuishi|Hirotaka Suzuoki|Yûji Ueda|Rikako Aikawa|Megumi Hayashibara|Unshô Ishizuka|Mika Kanai|Satomi Kôrogi|Rica Matsumoto|Shin'ichirô Miki|Mayumi Shintani
title: Pokémon: Mewtwo: El Regreso
